definition: bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: Gangs are buying assault weapons on the black market.
sentences.chinese: 黑幫總在黑市購置攻擊性兵器。

sentences.english: Officials note most apparently are in this country illegally.
sentences.chinese: 是說這些黑幫的人多數顯然是非法居留者。

sentences.english: "Nigga" is frequently heard in gangsta rap songs.
sentences.chinese: “黑鬼”是黑幫歌曲中頻繁使用的一個詞。
重慶黑幫嫌犯接受審判。

sentences.english: Downtown Shinjuku, Tokyo, is the heart of the battle between cops and gangs.
sentences.chinese: 東京新宿城區，是警察和黑幫的中心戰場。

sentences.english: A plot that colludes with by politician and sinister gang is approaching rude good people.
sentences.chinese: 一個由政客和黑幫串通的陰謀正在逼近野良。

sentences.english: In the second of those tumultuous years, I was labeled one of the "reactionary gang."
sentences.chinese: 那是的年吧，我被划進了“黑幫”隊伍裏。

sentences.english: However, sometimes, like today in Japan, they live up to their original values.
sentences.chinese: 然而，像如今的日本，黑幫有時靠武士精神來活。

sentences.english: Mr. Lee pays the yakuza a monthly protection fee for the privilege.
sentences.chinese: 他每個月都向黑幫交納保護費。

sentences.english: The local gang forced all the residents in the neighbourhood to kick over 10 dollars a month.
sentences.chinese: 當地黑幫團伙迫使該街區內居民每月繳付10美元。

sentences.english: Mr. Agata believes the yakuza have a useful place in Japanese society.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲黑幫在日本社會中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Huo Yuanjia fights with life-and-death of Tianjin harbor sinister gang to live.
sentences.chinese: 霍元甲爲生存和天津港黑幫殊死搏鬥。

sentences.english: Hi, the captain Ben Freeman and the sinister gang guys, you are under arrest now.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，隊長班費爾曼和黑幫的人，你們被捕了。

sentences.english: Shark Tale is a cartoon, but don't let that scare you.
sentences.chinese: 《鯊魚黑幫》是部卡通影片，但你不要望而卻步。

sentences.english: The clerk's scene segues into a restaurant involving gangsters and stock market scams.
sentences.chinese: 店員在餐館遇上黑幫老大和股市詐騙。

sentences.english: It took five days for the police to find the farmhouse in which the gang hid out and left incriminating fingerprints.
sentences.chinese: 警方用咯額五天查到黑幫藏身的地方和留下的指紋。

definition: to hide (as an undercover agent)/an insider (in a gang of thieves)/a mole
member of the same party/member of the same group/accomplice
